messages.subject: Re:Was Bedtimes ....Height (Short)
messages.msgSnippet: Hi Rachel Ann, ... If it makes you feel any better......I m 4 9 and hope that I never start to shrink.  If I do then I may disappear!!!!!! When I m wearing
messages.messageBody:
Hi Rachel Ann,

>Rachel Ann 5'3/4 in tall...at least last time I measured...who knows<
>if I haven't started to shrink. AAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAghhhhhhh<

If it makes you feel any better......I'm 4'9 and hope that I never
start to shrink. If I do then I may disappear!!!!!!
When I'm wearing shoes I even stretch it to 4'10!!
And to make matters worse, I still look like I'm a teenager.
Some women may like this but to me it really is a hassle sometimes.

Sherri P.
